casebody.data:
No. 74162 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MARCH 29, 2019

BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a Bank of New York, as Trustee for the Certificate Holders CWALT, Inc., Alternative Loan Trust 2006-2CB, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2006-2CB, Appellant,
v.
PREMIER ONE HOLDINGS, INC.; Yajun Chen; Countryside Homeowners Association; and Nevada Association Services, Inc., Respondents.

REVERSED. REMAND.
